// <auto-generated by Crisp Source Generator/>
#nullable enable

using Crisp.Runtime.Nodes;

namespace TestApp;

partial class SimpleAI
{
    public partial Crisp.Runtime.BtNode Build()
    {
        return new SelectorNode(
            new SequenceNode(
                new ConditionNode(() => (this.Health < 30)),
                new ActionNode(() => this.Flee())),
            new ActionNode(() => this.Patrol()));
    }
}
